path.description: The (optional) path to create the xliffmerge configuration.

localePath.description: The (optional) path where to create the translation files (relativ to src), default i18n.

i18n-format.description: The translation file format, XLIFF 1.2, XLIFF 2 or XMB/XTB.

i18n-locale.description: The default language used in your ng template files (local name like 'en' or 'de').

languages.description: Target languages that you want to support (comma separated list like 'en,de,fr').
